name: CTRL+ALT+REPEAT
description:
CTRL+ALT+REPEAT is a multiplayer 3D parkour platformer where you race against the clock and your friends. The game features 64 hand crafted levels across 4 worlds requiring patience and focus to complete.

Unlockable Movement Mechanics

  • Double Jump
  • Sliding
  • Wall Running
  • Grappling
  • Rail Grinding
  • Gliding

Some Obstacles You'll Encounter

  • Sweepers
  • Ferris Wheels
  • Lava
  • Jump Pads
  • Rotating Drums
  • Conveyor Belts
  • Boulders

Are you up to the challenge?
